Yup, sadly he's gone. I talked to him about it last week.

I'll miss his style, and I'll miss my pal.

post.author: Kristian Joensen
post.body: Well she just joined Microsoft. She used to work at Gearbox on Aliens: Colonial Marines, Brothers In Arms: Hell's Highway, Borderlands and a 4th game. She worked on platform technology, optimizing for the Xbox 360 and PS3, implementing various changes to UE3 stuff like that.

post.author: Pappy-R
post.body: Yes, they're going together. She also did Prey for HumanHead and is very highly respected code monster. She's been called "the female John Carmack" in a few pieces I've seen out there.

post.author: Kristian Joensen
post.body:
She never worked at Human Head. She did some technology experiments for what was to be a new engine for Prey at 3D Realms back in 1999. Her tech was never used and there was no other work done on the game back then other then her experiments. No game design, level design, art or sound/music work.

Anyways they already found a replacement for Kenneth, Stephan Martiniere.
